Reviews.Title: “A good average economical Hotel.”
Reviews.Author: cspacenz
Reviews.Content: I had several nights in this hotel, it was nothing special, quite basic, but perfectly fine for a few nights. The free internet terminal in the room is a great idea...except it didn't work. The drain in the shower was blocking up all the time and a few other little things like that but it was fine for what it is. I would stay here again and I would recommend it so it wasn't so bad. Breakfast downstairs was amazing, that was the best part of the whole deal. Make sure breakfast is included. Also, a beautiful Italian restaurant just down the corner you absolutely must visit.... Pan Degli Angeli Trattoria Stuttgarter Platz 20 Best wishes

Reviews.Title: “Avoid the budget rooms”
Reviews.Author: SCC2104
Reviews.Content: This used to be a very nice place to stay but over the years they have expanded and added "budget" rooms. These seem to be in the newer (newer as in ownership rather than build date) part of the hotel and seem to be thinner walled. This leads to excessive noise from the next door rooms and the corridor, although there does not seem to be and exterior noise intrusion. Pay the extra and have the superior room. Free internet access is always a bonus and the location is very good.

Reviews.Title: “Nice little hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Ilona52
Reviews.Content: My daughter and I stayed there for 5 nights last November when we visited Berlin for the 20th Anniversary of the Berlin Wall coming down. This place was super clean and comfortable, despite the small room size. Probably the only negative thing about it is the fact that there is no elevator and we were on the 4th floor which is non-smoking. Some nights I was so tired I literally crawled up the stairs. Other than that - absolutely no complaints. Staff is friendly and helpful and the free in-room computer/internet was definitely a plus. Price was good as well.

Reviews.Title: “One of Berlin's little gems.”
Reviews.Author: BaldEagleHarrogate
Reviews.Content: Good location opposite U bahn and S bahn station. Easily accessible by bus from Tegel Airport (15 mins or so) and on a direct train line to Schonefeld Airport (45-50 mins). Pleasant walk to Berlin's main Conference Centre (20-25 mins). Charlottenberg is a pleasant, green suburb. Very good staff, all extremely helpful. Computer with free internet access available in all rooms. Lounge area with never ending supply of coffee/tea/hot chocolate/fruit.

Reviews.Title: “Great value - highly recommended”
Reviews.Author: UMSITraveler
Reviews.Content: This hotel provides great value, a real boon given the falling dollar. I stayed there for the second time and found the rates very reasonable compared with other places in town. The location is directly across the street from the S-Bahn, an ideal starting part for traveling all around the city, and is also directly across from a taxi stand and close to the U-Bahn. Excellent restaurants within walking distance, with delicious local food at good prices. Stores and shops in the other direction. Breakfast downstairs for eight Euros is also good value. Selection not great but certainly adequate, and the fresh baked rolls and bread are excellent. The hotel staff is friendly and helpful, and speaks English. They also provided prompt responses when I made my reservations by e-mail. Rooms are small, but clean and adequately equipped. The free Internet and computer in every room is a real plus.

Reviews.Title: “Great value at Art Hotel Charlottenburg Hof”
Reviews.Author: BOBSAWAY
Reviews.Content: Great value for families at the Art Hotel Charlottenburg Hof. Good points: clean, friendly, spacious rooms, computer with free internet access in each room. Bad points: No lift, small bathrooms. Best points. Location, just across the road from Charlottenburg S bahn station, easy access to all parts of the city with frequent trains. Value, super value for families 4 bedded room 59 euro per night if booked through hotel off peak times Oct - March. Friendly and stylish cafe next door Cafe Miro good coffee and breakfast.

HotelInfo.Address: Stuttgarter Platz 14, 10627 Berlin, Germany
